Abstract
The presented paper is based upon a study focussing on the development of the
qualification and employment situation of women in Austria during the last three decades.
The research was financed by the Kammer für Arbeiter und Angestellte Wien and carried out
by the Institute for Advanced Studies (IHS) in Vienna in cooperation with the
Österreichischen Institut für Berufsbildungsforschung (ÖIBF). This paper discusses the
research carried out by the IHS - mainly based upon data of the Austrian Population Census
and Micro Census –
